name.baseName: Nitric acid, without water, in 50% solution state

dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Aqua fortis; Engraver's acid; Hydrogen nitrate; Acidum nitricum; Spirit of niter; Eau forte; Azotic acid; Salpetersaeure; Nitryl hydroxide; Nitric acid 50%; Nitric acid solution; Nitrate acid liquid 50%

Aqua fortis; Engraver's acid; Hydrogen nitrate; Acidum nitricum; Spirit of niter; Eau forte; Azotic acid; Salpetersaeure; Nitryl hydroxide; Nitric acid 50%; Nitric acid solution; Nitrate acid liquid 50%
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Nitric acid, anhydrous, provided in a 50% solution form. The description details its concentrated state, its quality as a chemical reagent, compliance with relevant standards, the manufacturing process it has undergone including any treatments, its common applications in various industries, and whether it is distributed for consumption or production purposes. Its state as a solution indicates it is mixed with another substance, typically water for acid solutions, and it specifies that it is made available 'to consumer' or 'at plant' depending on the context of use.
无水硝酸，以50％溶液形式提供。该描述详细说明了其浓缩状态，作为化学试剂的质量，符合相关标准，其经历的制造过程包括任何处理，其在各行各业的常见应用，以及它是分发给消费者还是生产目的。其作为溶液的状态表明它与另一种物质混合，典型的酸溶液通常与水混合，并且它指定根据使用的上下文环境，是'给消费者'还是'在工厂'使用。
